CHAT.comment: CONRAD M. BLACK, JOHN A. BOULTBEE, AND MARK S. KIPNIS, Petitioners v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:16 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MIGUEL A. ESTRADA ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MIGUEL A. ESTRADA ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:18 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
